Uses of Class
thelastpromise.Unit

Uses of Unit in thelastpromise
 

Subclasses of Unit in thelastpromise
 class Archer
           
 class ArchMage
           
 class AttackUnit
          This class extends the Unit class and is used to send the drawing information for the AttackUnit to its parent Unit class so it can be drawn, and to highlight the tiles that the AttackUnit can move to if it is selected.
 class Building
          The class extends the Object, draws the graphics, and opens the openBuildMenu
 class Butcher
           
 class Castle
           
 class FireSpirit
           
 class Horseman
          This class, Horseman, extends the AttackUnit.
 class Knight
           
 class Mage
          The class passes the location for the mage to be drawn and defines calls on its parent to allow the mage to move.
 class MagesTower
           
 class MagicSpirit
           
 class Summoner
           
 class SupportUnit
          This class draws the SupportUnit at the specifed location
 class Swordsman
          This class extends the AttackUnit and sets the image file on location loc, and sets the values for the attributes of the Swordsman.
 class Target
           
 class WorkerUnit
